Explore Our Green Catalog

Discover, Choose, Enjoy, Sustainable, Fresh

Categories

  • Fruits and Vegetables Category

    Explore a rainbow of fresh, organically grown fruits and vegetables, harvested at peak ripeness for maximum flavor and nutritional value.

  • Dairy Products Category

    Discover our range of organic dairy products, including milk, cheese, and yogurt, all sourced from animals raised on natural, sustainable farms.

  • Meat and Poultry Category

    Choose from ethically raised, grass-fed meat and free-range poultry, offering superior taste and nutrition while supporting humane farming practices.

Fruits and Vegetables Category

    Discover the rich, earthy flavor of our Heirloom Purple Carrots, a vibrant addition to any meal. Grown organically and locally sourced, these carrots boast a nutritional profile as colorful as their appearance.

  • Sweet Corn Heritage Varieties

    Our Sweet Corn Heritage Varieties are a celebration of flavor and tradition, meticulously grown to bring you the pinnacle of taste. These non-GMO, organically farmed kernels are a testament to the rich biodiversity and sustainable agriculture practices we cherish.

    Learn More

  • Organic Zucchini Blossoms

    Delicate, flavorful, and stunningly beautiful, our Organic Zucchini Blossoms are a gourmet delight, perfect for innovative dishes. Harvested by hand at dawn, these blossoms are a symbol of our commitment to quality and sustainability.

  • Organic Rainbow Chard

    Our Organic Rainbow Chard is as nutritious as it is colorful, offering a vibrant palette of greens, reds, and yellows. Grown with sustainable practices, this chard adds beauty and health to every meal.

    Learn More

  • Organic Spaghetti Squash

    Our Organic Spaghetti Squash is a versatile, low-carb alternative to pasta, with a delicate, slightly sweet flavor. Grown using regenerative farming techniques, it`s a wholesome choice for any healthy diet.

  • Organic Sweet Potatoes

Dairy Products Category

  • Organic Grass-Fed Milk

    Our Organic Grass-Fed Milk comes from happy, healthy cows that graze on lush pastures, resulting in milk that`s naturally richer in nutrients and flavor. Free from antibiotics and growth hormones, it`s pure, wholesome goodness in every sip.

    Learn More

  • Artisanal Organic Cheese

    Crafted with milk from grass-fed cows, our Artisanal Organic Cheese is aged to perfection, offering a complex flavor profile. This cheese not only tastes good but also supports sustainable and ethical farming practices.

    Learn More

  • Homemade Organic Yogurt

    Our Homemade Organic Yogurt is crafted from the freshest, organic milk sourced from grass-fed cows, offering a creamy texture and a rich, natural flavor. It`s packed with probiotics for a healthy gut, without any artificial additives or sweeteners.

    Learn More

  • Organic Butter

    Crafted from the cream of grass-fed cows, our Organic Butter boasts a rich flavor and a smooth, spreadable texture. It`s perfect for cooking, baking, or simply enjoying on fresh bread.

    Learn More

  • Organic Kefir

    Our Organic Kefir is a probiotic powerhouse, made from the milk of grass-fed cows. It`s tangy, refreshing, and perfect for digestive health.

    Learn More

  • Organic Cottage Cheese

    Our Organic Cottage Cheese is made from the freshest organic milk, offering a perfect blend of creamy texture and mild flavor. It`s high in protein and ideal for a healthy diet.
